short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Additional Features to Improve Your Brainly Experience. 
 Compatible with: (in, fr, us, ro, ru, id, pl, br)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tools to supercharge your Brainly experience.

Features:

-"For You" Feed
Tired of browsing questions for hours to find something you want to answer? Now you can simply click on the "For You" Feed and find a huge array of questions that suit your interest!
  
- Ginny Integration
Access the Brainly AI Tutor whenever you want. Just click a button and Ginny is ready to help!

- Paywall Bypass
Brainly Companion handles the website asking you for money so you can focus on your work!

- Question Previews
View what's in the question without loading the whole page. You can do everything you can do on the question page but with less bloat and more speed.

- Answering Dashboard
One page with all the data you could ever need! 
Follow link or use the "Answering Dashboard" link in the menu under your profile on the right to access it!

- Answering Tools
Added tools to the answering box to help you keep track of your word limit, making sure your Answer doesn't contain any banned words, and a handy Graphing Calculator available at the click of a button!


Support

https://github.com/Saransh-255/Brainly-Companion
Create an issue on the repository to report a bug or request a feature.
